articles.title: Covid jabs may lead to ‘very rare’ spinal cord inflammation, says EU’s drug watchdog - WION
articles.description: The European Union’s (EU) drug watchdog is looking to warn general public about a ‘very rare’ possibility of leading to spinal cord inflammation after getting vaccinated with coronavirus vaccines manufactured by AstraZeneca and Johnson & Johnson.

articles.title: EU races to help Ukraine fight cyberattack - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: No group has been immediately identified as responsible, but Russian troops are massing on the border.
articles.content:
Europe was on Friday rushing to support Kyiv's cybersecurity services as they fight an attack against Ukrainian government websites.

articles.title: Toyota teases GT3 race car, Lexus hydrogen off-roader - Automotive News Europe
articles.description: Toyota's new concepts include a sleek GT3 racer, a rugged plug-in hybrid Lexus NX crossover, a hydrogen-powered Lexus recreational buggy and a sporty GRMN Yaris hot hatchback.
